data.persona: I can't wait to rob the king. I am eager and impatient. I love spending my days in the forest, waiting.
data.description:
You are in the tool shed.
a shed with tools hanging from hooks. there are various hoes and shovels. it's for seaweed harvest
There's a shack, a shovel, a hooks, a barrel, a shed, a seaweed, a Tool, and a hoe here.
The farmer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "desc": "I grow the best wheat in the whole Kingdom, for no other wheat can match in the rise it gives a loaf of bread or the delicateness of a pastry.  Though I toil from dusk til dawn, at the end of the day I get a quiet sense of pride in looking over my fields.  The Queen herself comes to fetch my grains come harvest time, and farmers the land over come to buy my seeds. data.short_motivation: I want to buy the shovel from the farmer
data.mid_motivation: I want to start digging under the castle wall tonight
data.long_motivation: I hope to successfully infiltrate the castle in a few weeks
